backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports mapping features to files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of core frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and dark theme values.
frontend/index.html: HTML root document enabling dark mode and loading the React app entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component implementing the full HAND FOR ALL landing page with hero, features, how-it-works, applications, and contact sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and updating a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth client, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles with OKLCH color tokens for light/dark themes and smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point wiring React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query client.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, OKLCH color tokens, extended fonts, radii, and UI plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for a prosthetic-hand landing page, including design requirements, required images, and feature modules. Lists sections to build such as hero, features, how-it-works, applications, and contact.
